original_title: Two state institutions moved under Finance Ministry
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Ranil Wickremesinghe has issued a special gazette notification, moving two government institutions under the purview of the Ministry of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies.
Accordingly, Sahasya Investment Ltd and the National Equipment and Machinery Organization were moved under the purview of the Ministry.
Sahasya Investment Ltd was earlier under the Ministry of Transport and Highways.
The National Equipment and Machinery Organization was previously under the Ministry of Urban Development and Housing.
